name: PATIENT_MEB_NETWRK
description: This table links the enrolled membership (MEB) records with the patient.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the patient record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: BENEFIT_USAGE_ID
columns.description: The benefit usage IDs associated with the patient.
